25 1960s Southwestern Postcards

BRENDAN T. FIREFLY   06 December ’19

Lookin’


1960s Postcards of the Southwest

I found a book full of 1960s postcards from the Southwest in the dumpster. I should mention that the dumpster I found these in is about 2,000 miles from Las Cruces. View album on imgur.

Happy trails!
